news.title: Copper on pace for best year since 2009 as AI demand, supply fears fuel record price rally
news.summary: Analysts say copper's record-breaking run could continue next year. Supply disruptions and masssive spending on artificial intelligence are cited as reasons.

news.title: California's Ro Khanna faces Silicon Valley backlash after embracing wealth tax
news.summary: A proposal to tax California billionaires at 5% of their wealth could land on the California ballot in November. The proposal would apply to millionaires and billionaires with at least $1 billion in wealth.

news.title: Eurostar warns of ‘major disruption’ as power outage halts services between France and England
news.summary: The disruption brings one of Europe's busiest international rail corridors to a halt. The disruption comes at the peak of the New Year travel season.

news.title: Elon Musk envisions humanoid robots everywhere. China may be the first to make it a reality
news.summary: China has made the development of humanoid robots a strategic priority in its tech battle with the U.S. China has made it a priority to develop humanoid robots in a bid to compete with the United States.

news.title: Novo Nordisk's 'long game' on weight loss drugs sparks hope in science, but the Street is impatient
news.summary: The medicine developed by the100-year-old Danish drugmaker may impact patients' brains in surprising ways. The medicine was developed to treat conditions such as Parkinson's disease.

news.title: You told us your financial New Year’s resolutions. Here’s how to make them happen.
news.summary: MarketWatch readers shared their money goals for 2026. These tips can help them — and you — embrace habits to build wealth, pay down debt.

news.title: Is the stock market open on New Year’s Eve and New Year’s Day? Will the post office deliver mail?
news.summary: Be prepared for some holiday closures in 2026. As we greet 2026, be prepared to some holiday closure. Be prepared to be prepared for holiday closures.

news.title: The sneaky factor that Apple investors need to watch in the new year
news.summary: Apple's iPhone 6 expected to be released this fall. Will it be able to compete with Google and Samsung in the memory market? Will it have enough memory to keep up with growing memory costs?

news.title: This trader says AI IPOs and a falling dollar could drive the S&P 500 to 8,200 next year
news.summary: Samantha LaDuc has nailed some big calls on stocks in recent years. She sees another S&P 500 high coming in 2026, but an unhappy Main Street.

news.title: These stocks doubled the S&P 500’s return in 2025 — why a 2026 repeat looks likely
news.summary: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S.-based stocks are a much better bet.
